nodes.text: Blue Bantha was a non-alcoholic beverage served at Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu in 34 ABY. The drink consisted of a glass of blue milk with a cookie on top decorated with the image of a bantha horn. The milk was the same locally-farmed bantha milk found at the Milk Stand. The cookie and the blue milk were both suitable for human consumption.

Blue Bantha is one of the non-alcoholic beverages sold to customers at the Oga's Cantina bar in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. It was first revealed as part of a large promotional event held on February 26, 2019. The menu's description reads, "Blue Milk served chilled with Bantha-inspired Vanilla-Butter Sugar Cookie."
